about_the_game:
Roommate Corruption tells the story of a guy about to start university. He leaves his hometown in search of a temporary place to stay until he finds a suitable flat and completes his enrollment. Luckily, his childhood friend Hana lives near the university and offers him a room in her apartment.

However, upon moving in, he quickly realizes that Hana has changed. She acts arrogantly, doesn’t take him seriously, and comes across as quite difficult. But our hero knows how to change that, and he begins to educate her...

Roommate Corruption is a short novel about transformation, divided into five episodes—each showcasing a shift in Hana's character until she ultimately becomes obedient. Experience these episodes, spend time with Hana, and show her how to behave.

FEATURES:

  • Hundreds of high-quality renders with cinematic framing

  • Approximately 1.5 hours of content

  • Original in-game assets

  • Plenty of 🔥 hot scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general mature content, sexual acts, non-consensual sex, sex acts with dubious consent.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: A short visual novel about transforming your roommate into an obedient girlfriend...
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
